quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Collin Powell

quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I remember, involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I love teddy he is so delicious.
quotes.author: Tali
